price: নিঃসন্দেহে, এই কথা নিশ্চিত যে, সিহঁতেই আখিৰাতত হ’ব ক্ষতিগ্ৰস্ত।
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-khāsirūna
